about_the_game:
Like Yu Escape / Monday? Want to help us make more sexy content?
Look no further! Show your support and get a bunch of neat goodies!

Buy this pack to unlock access to Shi's SEXtra challenge!


How could Shi have hidden TWELVE sexy secrets in this one tiny apartment?!

Shi's SEXtra challenge features:

  • TWELVE... sexy secrets waiting to be discovered!
  • TWELVE... additional pieces of adult artwork!

content_descriptors.notes: Yu Escape / Monday - Shi's SEXtra Challenge contains adult imagery that is only suitable for adult gamers.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 4th Gen or similiar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRam, Shader Model 4
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 Display recommended
